original_title: Ayumi Hamasaki Arena Tour 2012 A: Hotel Love Songs
overview: Ayumi Hamasaki Arena Tour 2012 A: Hotel Love Songs is Japanese pop singer Ayumi Hamasaki's 14th Tour started on April 7, 2012 at Saitama Super Arena ending with additional performances on October 11, 2012 at First gymnasium National Yoyogi Stadium
tagline: Ayumi Hamasaki Arena Tour 2012 A: Hotel Love Songs
title: Ayumi Hamasaki Arena Tour 2012 A: Hotel Love Songs
